mapper.sql: stu_id, stu_name, stu_major, stu_password, stu_create_time, stu_class, stu_enter_year
mapper.select: select ,@rank :=@rank+1 as rank from jlau_student,(Select @rank:=0) init where stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into jlau_student (stu_id, stu_name, stu_major, stu_password, stu_create_time, stu_class, stu_enter_year) values (#{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stuClass,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{stuEnterYear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

stu_id,

mapper.update:
update jlau_student
stu_name = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stu_major = #{stuMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stu_password = #{stuPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stu_create_time = #{stuCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
stu_class = #{stuClass,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
stu_enter_year = #{stuEnterYear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update jlau_student set stu_name = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_major = #{stuMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_password = #{stuPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_create_time = #{stuCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, stu_class = #{stuClass,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, stu_enter_year = #{stuEnterYear,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
